Research Interests

Deep Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning, Natural Language Processing, Emergent Communication, Theory of Mind, Grounded Language Understanding, Pragmatic Agents

About

I am a Software Engineer at Okta and a MS student at the Georgia Institute of Technology studying Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning. The current focus of my full-time work is on how to deploy machine learning models to detect and prevent user account-takeover and large-scale cyberattacks. I graduated from the University of Waterloo with a (Hons) Bachelor of Computer Science in 2019. Here you can find my resume; my CV is still a work in progress.

My current research focus is on the intersection of Emergent Communication and Theory of Mind principals. New collaborators and research opportunities are welcome!
